verbs.description: 12 News [V: has] been awarded a regional Edward R. Murrow Award for Breaking News Coverage for its coverage of President Donald Trump 's rally last August .
12 News has [V: been] awarded a regional Edward R. Murrow Award for Breaking News Coverage for its coverage of President Donald Trump 's rally last August .
[ARG2: 12 News] has been [V: awarded] [ARG1: a regional Edward R. Murrow Award for Breaking News Coverage for its coverage of President Donald Trump 's rally last August] .
